page.title: 09CALENDAR OF ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: {FEBRUARY }The annual Eisteddfod at Aberaeron Comprehensive still attracts a large gathering of parents,friends and old pupils. {EASTER }Over the last 20 years the Cardiganshire Football League has held it's cup final on Square Field. {WHITSUN} The opening of the Aberaeron sports club takes place annually on Spring Bank Holiday Monday. {AUGUST }A number of popular events are held in August. 1 The tug of war competition across the Harbour 2 The Town's sheepdog trials 3 The annual rugby seven a side competition which attracts leading clubs from England and Wales. 4 The Bank Holiday carnival {NOVEMBER} Annual fair dating back to the last century.
